name: Sun Slash
description:
------------------------------------------------------------------

WHO IS THE QUICKEST SAMURAI?!?!?!

Take part in a classic Samurai standoff where the fastest blade always wins!

Test your speedy skills against the AI in ONE-PLAYER mode or go head-to-head with a friend in TWO-PLAYER mode! 

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Features:

  • One-Player Mode against the skilled AI
  • Two-Player Local Multiplayer
  • Best out of One, Three, and Five modes

---------------------------------------------------------------------

How to Play:

  • When the word SLASH appears:
    • Player-One will press LEFT-SHIFT
    • Player-Two will press RIGHT-SHIFT
    • The fastest SLASH wins!
  • Don't SLASH too early otherwise you'll lose that round!

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Download Instructions:

  1. Download the Game File.
  2. Right-Click on the ZIP File.
  3. Click on the Extract All button from the drop-down menu.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Note:

This game project may receive small updates in the future.
